installer.initial_account_will_be_administrator_au: The initial account will be administrator automatically.

breaking_changes.v346_using_basic_auth: Basic Authentication currently in use will no longer be available in the near future. Remove settings from %s

notice.restricted_defail: Once the admin approves your sign up, you'll be able to access this wiki.

form_help.email: You must have email address which listed below to sign up to this wiki.
form_help.password: Your password must be at least 6 characters long.
form_help.user_id: The URL of pages you create will contain your User ID. Your User ID can consist of letters, numbers, and some symbols.

form_help.profile_image2: Set up AWS or enable local uploads.

notice.update_token1: You can update to generate a new API Token.
notice.update_token2: You will need to update the API Token in any existing processes.

and.desc: Search pages that include both {{word1}}, {{word2}} in the title or body

exclude.desc: Exclude pages that include {{word}} in the title or body

phrase.desc: Search pages that include the phrase "{{phrase}}"

prefix.desc: Search only the pages that the title start with {{path}}

exclude_prefix.desc: Exclude the pages that the title start with {{path}}

notice.version: This is not the current version.
notice.unlinked: Redirect pages to this page have been deleted.
notice.restricted: Access to this page is restricted

page_edit.overwrite_scopes: {{operation}} and Overwrite scopes of all descendants

notice.conflict: Couldn't save the changes you made because someone else was editing this page. Please re-edit the affected section after reloading the page.

page_api_error.notfound_or_forbidden: Original page is not found or forbidden.
page_api_error.outdated: Page is updated someone and now outdated.
page_api_error.user_not_admin: Only admin user can delete completely

help.redirect: Redirect to new page if someone accesses %s
help.metadata: Remains last update user and updated date as is

modal_delete.delete_completely_restriction: You don't have the authority to delete pages completely.
modal_delete.completely: Delete completely instead of putting it into trash.

help.recursively: Put Back children of under %s recursively

children.label: Template for children
children.desc: Applies only to the same level pages which the template exists

admin_top.wiki_administrator: Only Wiki administrator can access this page
admin_top.assign_administrator: You can assign administrator from Assign administrator button in the User management page

app_setting.sitename_change: You can change Site Name which is used for header and HTML title.
app_setting.header_content: The contents entered here will be shown in the header etc.
app_setting.Site URL desc: This is for the site URL setting.
app_setting.Site URL warn: Some features don't work because the site URL is not set.
app_setting.siteurl_help: Site full URL beginning from http:// or https://.
app_setting.enable_files_except_image: Enable file upload other than image files.
app_setting.attach_enable: You can attach files other than image files if you enable this option.
app_setting.SMTP_used: If you have SMTP settings, it will be used.
app_setting.SMTP_but_AWS: If you do not have SMTP settings but AWS settings,  e-mails will be sent by SES.
app_setting.neihter_of: If you do not of neither of these, e-mails will not be sent.
app_setting.AWS_access: This is for AWS settings. If you complete AWS settings, file upload function, profile picture function etc will be enabled.
app_setting.No_SMTP_setting: If you do not have SMTP settings, e-mails will be sent via SES. You need to verify from e-mail address and production settings.
app_setting.change_setting: Caution:if you change this setting not completed, you will not be able to access files you have uploaded so far.
app_setting.custom_endpoint_change: Input the URL of the endpoint of an object storage service like MinIO that has a S3-compatible API.  Amazon S3 is used if empty.
app_setting.Use env var if empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable %s is used.

security_setting.Fixed by env var: This is fixed by the env var %s=%s.
security_setting.Register limitation desc: Restricts ways to register new user.
security_setting.The whitelist of registration permission: The whitelist of registration permission E-mail address
security_setting.users_without_account: Users without account is not accessible
security_setting.restrict_emails: You can restrict registerable e-mail address.
security_setting.for_instance: For instance, if you use growi within a company, you can write
security_setting.only_those: Only those whose e-mail address including the company address can register.
security_setting.insert_single: Please insert single e-mail address per line.
security_setting.page_listing_1_desc: Show pages that are restricted by 'Just Me' option when listing/searching
security_setting.page_listing_2_desc: Show pages that are restricted by User Group when listing/searching
security_setting.complete_deletion_explain: Restricts users who can completely delete pages.
security_setting.alert_siteUrl_is_not_set: 'Site URL' is NOT set. Set it from the %s
security_setting.desc_of_callback_URL: Use it in the setting of the %s provider
security_setting.Treat username matching as identical: Automatically bind external accounts newly logged in to local accounts when %s match
security_setting.Treat username matching as identical_war: WARNING: Be aware of security because the system treats the same user as a match of %s.
security_setting.Treat email matching as identical: Automatically bind external accounts newly logged in to local accounts when %s match
security_setting.Treat email matching as identical_warn: WARNING: Be aware of security because the system treats the same user as a match of %s.
security_setting.Use default if both are empty: If both ​​are empty, the default value %s is used.
security_setting.missing mandatory configs: The following mandatory items are not set in either database nor environment variables.

ldap.server_url_detail: The LDAP URL of the directory service in the format ldap://host:port/DN or ldaps://host:port/DN.
ldap.bind_DN_manager_detail: The DN of the account that authenticates and queries the directory service
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail1: The query used to bind with the directory service.
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.bind_DN_password_manager_detail: The password for the Bind DN account.
ldap.bind_DN_password_user_detail: The password that is entered in the login page will be used to bind.
ldap.search_filter_detail1: The query used to locate the authenticated user.
ldap.search_filter_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.search_filter_detail3: If empty, the filter (uid={{username}}) is used.
ldap.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
ldap.name_detail: Specification of mappings for full name when creating new users
ldap.mail_detail: Specification of mappings for mail address when creating new users
ldap.group_search_base_DN_detail: The base DN from which to search for groups. If defined, also Group Search Filter must be defined for the search to work.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail1: The query used to filter for groups.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail2: Login via LDAP is accepted only when this query hits one or more groups.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail3: Use {{dn}} to have it replaced of the found user object.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail4: (&(cn=group1)(memberUid={{dn}})) hits the groups which has cn=group1 and memberUid includes the user's uid(when Group DN Property is not changed from the default value.)
ldap.group_search_user_DN_property_detail: The property of user object to use in {{dn}} interpolation of Group Search Filter.

SAML.name: SAML
SAML.id_detail: Specification of the name of attribute which can identify the user in SAML Identity Provider
SAML.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
SAML.mapping_detail: Specification of mappings for %s when creating new users
SAML.cert_detail: PEM-encoded X.509 signing certificate to validate the response from IdP
SAML.Use env var if empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable %s is used.
SAML.note for the only env option:
The setting item that enables or disables the SAML authentication and the highlighted setting items use only the value of environment variables.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable %s .

Basic.name: Basic Authentication
Basic.desc_2: User will be automatically generated if not exist.

OAuth.change_redirect_url:
Enter %s
(where %s is your host name) for "Authorized redirect URIs".

Google.name: Google OAuth
Google.register_2: Create Project if no projects exist
Google.register_3: Create Credentials → OAuth client ID → Select "Web application"
Google.register_4: Register your OAuth App with one of Authorized redirect URIs as %s
Google.register_5: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

Twitter.name: Twitter OAuth
Twitter.register_3: Create Credentials → OAuth client ID → Select "Web application"
Twitter.register_4: Register your OAuth App with one of Authorized redirect URIs as %s
Twitter.register_5: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

GitHub.name: GitHub OAuth
GitHub.register_2: Register your OAuth App with "Authorization callback URL" as %s
GitHub.register_3: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

OIDC.name: OpenID Connect
OIDC.id_detail: Specification of the name of attribute which can identify the user in OIDC claims
OIDC.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
OIDC.name_detail: Specification of mappings for name when creating new users
OIDC.mapping_detail: Specification of mappings for %s when creating new users
OIDC.register_2: Register your OIDC App with "Authorization callback URL" as %s
OIDC.register_3: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

markdown_setting.line_break_setting_desc: You can change line break settings.
markdown_setting.Enable Line Break desc: Treat line break in the text page as<br>in HTML
markdown_setting.Enable Line Break for comment desc: Treat line break in comment as<br>in HTML
markdown_setting.XSS_setting_desc: You can change the handling of HTML tags in markdown text.
markdown_setting.Ignore all tags desc: Stripe all HTML tags and attributes
markdown_setting.updated_lineBreak: Succeeded to update line braek setting

email.ifttt_link: Create a new IFTTT applet with Email trigger

customize_page.function_choose: You can choose Valid/Invalid of the function
customize_page.subpage_display: You can show the timeline of the subpages.
customize_page.performance_decrease: If there are many subpages, performance decreases while page loading.
customize_page.list_page_display: You can speed up list page display by invalidating.
customize_page.save_edit: Save edit tab and history tab switching in the browser and make it object for forward/back command of the browser.
customize_page.by_invalidating: By invalidating, you can make page transition as the only object for forward/back command of the browser.
customize_page.nocdn_desc:
This function is disabled when the environment variable NO_CDN=true.
Github style has been forcibly applied.
customize_page.custom_title_detail:
You can customize %s tag.
%s will be automatically replaced with the app name, and %s will be replaced with the page name/path.
customize_page.custom_header_detail:
You can customize HTML header that applies all pages. Your custom script will be inserted in <header> but above other <script> tags.
Relaod page to see changes.
customize_page.write_CSS: You can write CSS that is applied to whole system.
customize_page.reflect_change: You need to reload the page to reflect the change.
customize_page.write_java: You can write Javascript that is applied to whole system.
customize_page.attach_title_header: Add h1 section when create new page automatically
customize_page.attach_title_header_desc: Add page path to the first line as h1 section when create new page
customize_page.recent_created__n_draft_num_desc: Number of Recently Created Pages & Drafts Displayed
customize_page.recently_created_n_draft_num_desc: Number of recently created pages and drafts displayed on user page
customize_page.update_customHeader_success: Succeeded to update customize html header

layout_description.growi_text1: Full screen layout and thin margins/paddings
layout_description.growi_text2: Show and post comments at the bottom of the page
layout_description.kibela_text2: Show and post comments at the bottom of the page
layout_description.crowi_text2: Show and post comments in Sidebar

behavior_description.growi_text1: Both of /page and /page/ shows the same page。
behavior_description.growi_text3: All pages shows the list of sub pages if using GROWI Enhanced Layout
behavior_description.crowi_text2: /page/ shows the list of sub pages
behavior_description.crowi_text3: If portal is applied to /page/ , the portal and the list of sub pages are shown

user_management.temporary_password: The created user has a temporary password
user_management.send_temporary_password: Be sure to copy the temporary password ON THIS SCREEN and send it to the user.
user_management.password_reset_message: Let the user know the new password below and strongly recommend to change another one immediately.
user_management.send_new_password: Please send the new password to the user.
user_management.password_never_seen: The temporary password can never be retrieved after this screen is closed.
user_management.your_own: You cannot deactivate your own account
user_management.cannot_remove: You cannot remove yourself from administrator
user_management.cannot_invite_maximum_users: Can not invite more than the maximum number of users.

user_group_management.add_user: Add a User to the Created Group
user_group_management.deny_create_group: You can't create a new group with the current settings
user_group_management.choose_action: Choose an action for private pages
user_group_management.group_and_pages_not_retrievable: Once deleted, the deleted group and its private pages cannot be retrieved
user_group_management.no_pages: There are no pages the group has view permission

growi_settings.overwrite_documents: Imported documents will overwrite existing documents

errors.depends: '{{target}}' must be selected when '{{condition}}' is selected.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite page's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

set_public_to_page.label: Set 'Public' to the pages that is '{{from}}'
set_public_to_page.desc: Make sure that this configuration makes all '{{from}}' pages readable from ANY users.

initialize_meta_datas.label: Initialize page's like, read users and comment count
initialize_meta_datas.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

initialize_hackmd_related_datas.label: Initialize HackMD related data
initialize_hackmd_related_datas.desc: Recommended to check this unless there is important drafts on HackMD.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite revision's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

importer_management.page_skip: Pages with a name that already exists on GROWI are not imported

full_text_search_management.rebuild_description_2: Click 'Build Now' to delete and create mapping file and add all pages.

export_management.desc_password_seed:
DO NOT FORGET to set current PASSWORD_SEED to your new GROWI system when restoring user data, or users will NOT be able to login with their password.

HINT:
The current PASSWORD_SEED will be stored in meta.json in exported ZIP.
